name: [GAME] [4.1+] [FREE] Clappy Cats new Android Game for 2 Players !
name_original: [GAME] [4.1+] [FREE] Clappy Cats new Android Game for 2 Players !
description:
Type: Arcade, Pretend Play
Size: 24M
System requirements: Android 4.1+

Choose your character and join the battle between two players. 
Hone your reaction in a 1-1 fight. Be the first! 

Incredible music, bewitching purrs guarantee you a great mood and a sea of emotions. 

This game consists of only one level, so that you do not have to understand the gameplay for a long time. A couple of taps and you can already fully enjoy the game! 

Have a nice time, buddy!
